title: Difficulty seeing cursor on higher resolution
body: Hi, I was wondering if anybody could help me as I have recently got a new laptop with a resolution of 2560x1440 and i'm having difficulty seeing the in-game cursor because it is extremely small. I always lose where it is in team fights, and it doesn't help that my mouse keeps freezing so i think the cursor is somewhere else and it takes ages to find the tiny thing. Is there an option to change the size of the cursor, because I looked and couldn't find one, perhaps I missed it. Thanks.

replies.body:
Sadly there is not, it pisses off 4K players

That said, why not just upscale? 1440p is way too big for a laptop, at least for gaming. Kind of silly under a 27 inch monitor is the general opinion. For art/design it makes more sense. Plus you would get more performance, if needed.
That's a shame that there isn't proper scaling for the cursor. They should probably fix that.

The number of people playing on monitors with really high pixel density is very low, so it is not a priority.
